Package gw.cc.financials.bulkpay.entity

Interface BulkInvoiceItem

public interface BulkInvoiceItem
BulkInvoiceItem Individual item on a bulk invoice.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    delete()
    Deletes this BulkInvoiceItem and its associated payment/check.
    IMoney
    getAmountComponent()
    Returns the amount and currency of this invoice item, as an IMoney.
    Payment
    getAssociatedPayment()
    This is a convenience method to easily retrieve the single payment associated with this bulk invoice item, if any.

    Gets the value of the BulkInvoiceItemInfo field.
    Claim
    getClaim()
    The Claim for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.
    String
    getClaimNumber()
    Gets the value of the ClaimNumber field.
    Currency

    Gets the currency associated with the bulk invoice.
    Exposure
    getExposure()
    The Exposure, if any, for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.

    Returns the amount of this invoice item in the reporting currency (default currency in 5.0.x).

  • Method Details

    • setClaim

      void setClaim(Claim c)
      The Claim for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.

    • getClaim

      Claim getClaim()
      The Claim for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.

    • setExposure

      void setExposure(Exposure e)
      The Exposure, if any, for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.

    • getExposure

      Exposure getExposure()
      The Exposure, if any, for which this BulkInvoiceItem represents a payment.

    • delete

      void delete()
      Deletes this BulkInvoiceItem and its associated payment/check.

    • getReserveLine

      ReserveLine getReserveLine()
      Retrieves the ReserveLine to which this BulkInvoiceItem is linked, if any.
      Returns:
      the ReserveLine for this BulkInvoiceItem, or NULL if the item does not yet have a ReserveLine.

    • isEditable

      boolean isEditable()
      Tests whether this BulkInvoiceItem is editable. It is editable if:

      • The status is one of:
        1. BulkInvoiceItemStatus.TC_DRAFT
        2. BulkInvoiceItemStatus.TC_NOTVALID
      or
      • The status of the owning Bulk Invoice is BulkInvoiceStatus.TC_AWAITINGSUBMISSION and the status of this item is one of:
        1. BulkInvoiceItemStatus.TC_APPROVED
        2. BulkInvoiceItemStatus.TC_REJECTED
        3. BulkInvoiceItemStatus.TC_INREVIEW

      Returns:
      true if this BulkInvoiceItem is editable, else false

    • setClaimByClaimNumber

      String setClaimByClaimNumber(String claimNumber)
      This method is used to set the claim on a BulkInvoiceItem by setting its Claim Number.
      Parameters:
      claimNumber - The claim # of the claim to set into the BulkInvoiceItem
      Returns:
      the Claim Number as a String if it's valid, otherwise returns NULL

    • updateRelatedInvoiceItemFields

      void updateRelatedInvoiceItemFields()
      Updates the proper fields on the BulkInvoiceItem to match the values required by the reserve line assigned to this item. Should be called whenever the reserve line is changed.

    • getAssociatedPayment

      Payment getAssociatedPayment()
      This is a convenience method to easily retrieve the single payment associated with this bulk invoice item, if any. If this bulk invoice item does not have an associated check/payment, then NULL will be returned
      Returns:
      this item's associated Payment, or NULL if no check/payment is associated with this item.

    • getReportingAmount

      CurrencyAmount getReportingAmount()
      Returns the amount of this invoice item in the reporting currency (default currency in 5.0.x).

    • getAmountComponent

      IMoney getAmountComponent()
      Returns the amount and currency of this invoice item, as an IMoney. The currency is the owning invoice's currency.
      Returns:
      IMoney representing this item's amount and currency

    • getReserveLineWrapper

      ReserveLineWrapper getReserveLineWrapper()
      Returns:
      Reserve line wrapper on BulkInvoiceItemInfo

    • setReserveLineWrapper

      void setReserveLineWrapper(ReserveLineWrapper reserveLineWrapper)
      Parameters:
      reserveLineWrapper - The value to set on BulkInvoiceItemInfo

    • getCurrency

      Currency getCurrency()
      Gets the currency associated with the bulk invoice.

    • isItemClaimPurged

      boolean isItemClaimPurged()
      Returns whether this item's claim has been purged

    • isItemClaimArchived

      boolean isItemClaimArchived()
      True if this item's claim is archived. false if the Claim (ClaimInfo) has not been set yet, or the claim is not archived.

    • getValidPaymentTypes

      List<PaymentType> getValidPaymentTypes()
      Retrieves the list of possible valid PaymentTypes for this BulkInvoiceItem.

      Pre-condition: The BulkInvoiceItem must have an associated ReserveLine (even if it's a new ReserveLine).

      Returns:
      a list of the valid PaymentType values

    • getClaimNumber

      String getClaimNumber()
      Gets the value of the ClaimNumber field. Claim Number of the claim that this BulkInvoiceItem is related to.

    • getBulkInvoiceItemInfo

      BulkInvoiceItemInfo getBulkInvoiceItemInfo()
      Gets the value of the BulkInvoiceItemInfo field. Links a BulkInvoiceItem to its info. Returns null if the associated Claim is Archived.

    • setPaymentType

      void setPaymentType(PaymentType value)
      Sets the value of the PaymentType field.
